posts.post_content:
Posted By: Mike Taylor
Back into the vault for the time being.

Posted By: Tim Newcomb
You are unlikely to get anything but requests for scans (as opposed to firm offers) since we know  nothing at all about condition in your post-- you might want to give a little more info on that question up front.

Tim

Posted By: Mike Taylor
Tim,

Thanks for pointing that out to me.  The terms and conditions are boilerplate that I add at the end of anything I have for sale as a disclaimer.  I was in a hurry this time to write the FS post and forgot to add a description of each card's condition.  This has been fixed...OBLIGATORY BUMP AS WELL.
